successes.title: Vufine: a Handsfree Wearable Display
successes.description: Vufine is a handsfree wearable display that allows you to enjoy the familiar functionality of your current technology in a new way.

Pledges.description: Every dollar counts! For $1 you will receive a thank you email and be the first to hear about new campaign updates.
Thanks for your support: For $5, you’ll receive a one-of-a-kind Vufine sticker and be the first to hear about new campaign updates.
Vufine T-Shirt: As a thank you for embarking on this journey with us, you’ll receive an awesome Vufine t-shirt with your $25 contribution.

Early, Early Bird Vufine: We appreciate you being one of the first to jump on the Vufine bandwagon. For a $99 contribution, you’ll get the entire Vufine package: one black Vufine, one docking station, a custom soft-HDMI cable, one USB charging cable and one pair of non-prescription glasses.

Early Bird Vufine: Thanks for being one of our early supporters! For a $125 contribution, you’ll save $24 and receive one Vufine package: one black Vufine, one docking station, a custom soft-HDMI cable, one USB charging cable and one pair of non-prescription glasses.

Vufine: For a $149 contribution, you’ll receive one full Vufine package: one black Vufine, one docking station, a custom soft-HDMI cable, one USB charging cable and one pair of non-prescription glasses.

COOL GREY Vufine: For a $149 contribution, you’ll receive one full special edition Vufine package in cool grey: one cool grey Vufine, one docking station, a custom soft-HDMI cable, one USB charging cable and one pair of non-prescription glasses.

COOL GREY Vufine: For a $149 contribution, you’ll receive one full special edition Vufine package in cool grey: one cool grey Vufine, one docking station, a custom soft-HDMI cable, one USB charging cable and one pair of non-prescription glasses.

Double the Vufine: For a $280 contribution, you’ll receive not one, but two Vufine packages: two black Vufines, two docking stations, two custom soft-HDMI cables, two USB charging cables and two pairs of non-prescription glasses.
Family Pack: Do you have a family that would love this wearable display? For a $560 contribution, you’ll get a four Vufine packages.
Distributor Pack of 10: Do you think that your customers would love Vufine? For a  $1,400 contribution, you’ll receive a special distributor pack of 10 Vufine packages.
